mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(MENU_NO , '|',UPPER_MENU_NO , '|',MENU_NM , '|',PROGRM_FILE_NM , '|',MENU_NO , '|',MENU_ORDR , '|',MENU_NM , '|',UPPER_MENU_NO , '|',MENU_DC , '|',RELATE_IMAGE_PATH , '|',RELATE_IMAGE_NM , '|',PROGRM_FILE_NM,'|') AS menu FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE MENU_NO <> 0

SELECT A.MENU_NO , A.UPPER_MENU_NO , A.MENU_NM , A.PROGRM_FILE_NM , A.MENU_NO , A.MENU_ORDR , A.MENU_NM , A.UPPER_MENU_NO , A.MENU_DC , A.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH , A.RELATE_IMAGE_NM , A.PROGRM_FILE_NM , CASE WHEN B.MENU_NO > 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS YN FROM COMTNMENUINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MENU_NO, AUTHOR_GRP_CODE FROM COMTNMENUCREATDTLS WHERE AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = #{AUTHGRPCD}) B ON (A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO) WHERE A.MENU_NO <> 0
